wikitext.*:
'''Ailinónë''' was the name of a "[[Fays|fairy]] who dwelt in a [[Lilies|lily]] on a pool", according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] associated with ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref>{{PE|12}}, p. 29</ref> Nothing else is known about her, and she doesn't appear in any of the narratives.

== Etymology ==
The name ''Ailinónë'' is in [[Qenya]], possibly being a feminized form of ''[[ailinon]]'' ("water lily").<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-4125439641.html|articlename=ᴱQ. ''Ailinóne'' f.|website=Eldamo|accessed=9 May 2022}}</ref>
